edition.label: Satyricon, Petronius, with an English translation by Michael Heseltine Seneca. Apocolocyntosis, with an English translation by W.H.D. Rouse
edition.description: Petronius Arbiter, creator; Seneca, Lucius Annaeus, ca. 4 B.C.-65 A.D, creator; Heseltine, Michael, editor; Heseltine, Michael, translator; Rouse, W. H. D. (William Henry Denham), 1863-1950, translator
